name: Probe Droid (V)
Lore: 'Arakyd Viper probe droid. Has sensors specifically designed to detect traces of Rebel activity. Equipped with an auto-destruct mechanism. A highly durable spy droid.',
Text: 'When drawn for destiny, you may peek at opponent''s hand. Provides presence. Thrice per turn, your Imperial may deploy -1 to same site. Your total battle destiny here is +1 for each Imperial here.',
